Interface Line

Component
All Known Implementing Classes:
Line3D
public interface Line
extends Component

Method Summary
 double getAngle(Line line)
          Returns the angle in radians between this line and the line parameter; the return value is constrained to the range [0,PI].
 double getAngle(Plane plane)
          Returns the angle in radians between this line and the plane parameter; the return value is constrained to the range [0,PI].

          Returns the vector of the direction of this line.

          Returns the distance between this line and the point parameter.

          Computes the intersection of this and the given line.
 Point getIntersection(Plane plane)
          Computes the intersection of this line and the given plane.

          Returns the parameters for this line.
 javax.vecmath.Point3d getPointOnLine()
          Returns a point on this line.
 javax.vecmath.Point3d[] getPoints()
          Returns an Array of the two Point3d objects which define the line

          Returns the Shape3D object of this line.

Method Detail

getPoints

javax.vecmath.Point3d[] getPoints()
Returns an Array of the two Point3d objects which define the line

Returns:
Point3d Array which define the line

getLineParameters

double[] getLineParameters()
Returns the parameters for this line. The returned array contains of 6 elements, whereas the first three are a point on the line and second three show the direction of the line.

Returns:
the parameters for this line

getShape

javax.media.j3d.Shape3D getShape(ComponentAppearance.AppearanceType type)
Returns the Shape3D object of this line. Note that this shape object is implicit coupled with its appearance.

Specified by:
getShape in interface Component
Returns:
the Shape3D object of this line

                      throws NoIntersectionException

Returns:

Returns the angle in radians between this line and the line parameter; the return value is constrained to the range [0,PI].

Returns:
the angle in radians in the range [0,PI]
